full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN RUNG BA ZHIG MI SNANG BAS KUNGS SNGAGS 'KHYER BDE'I CHOG ZHIG CIS KYANG [???] ZHES NAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA GONG NA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG SROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS SU [???] SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
